biotools.summary: PepFormer is a end-to-end Siamese network coupled with a hybrid architecture of a Transformer and gated recurrent units that is able to predict the peptide detectability based on peptide sequences only.

bioschemas.name: PepFormer
bioschemas.summary: PepFormer is a end-to-end Siamese network coupled with a hybrid architecture of a Transformer and gated recurrent units that is able to predict the peptide detectability based on peptide sequences only.
